text: Oliver Rackham (17 October 1939 â€“ 12 February 2015) was a British academic. He studied the British countryside, especially trees, woodlands and wood pasture, Rackham wrote a number of books, including The History of the Countryside (1986) and one on Hatfield Forest. He died on 12 February 2015 at the age of 75. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Academics of the University of Cambridge Category:People from Norwich
title: Oliver Rackham
